topic.title: Can we get a German Forum?
topic.body:
Hey, 

we have Main - Espanol - French etc etc

Can we get German too? Or should I just try to actually make my own, german forum?

2_1JXFzMzrQTJCiGw36YNQGg2Tmt1hTHy7ZT.body: Im online and im guessing znet will become more popular soon

> [tkarita](#comment_26_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): It was mentioned again by TorrentFreak yesterday.

Nice, I just heard about znet like 30 mins ago on lewd.sx, instantly DLd

1_19GDcmuGz3D2epgu9k65yMY9WMYDG8eZCP.body: Its already done, save the link :) sirenyc posted it

1_1NGtwPu16u2iVu35a6jwGF7ijxN6yUXaBA.body: Hmmmh, you got a point there. They really need to think something up for that

1_1DZr3dWHcLESuHx7UeC23QSXfQFvBdFT9s.body:
> [tkarita](#comment_27_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): You could clone ZeroTalk.  I think you have to contact nofish to get added to the list.

Thanks for you comment. Got any contact information from nofish? Would write him now then.

> [tkarita](#comment_28_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=nofish

Thank you. 
For Germans -> http://127.0.0.1:43110/17MGAfkzNGMn1ZY5V8yLqH4H4ngxaXAJY5/

Still figuring out how to edit stuff and so on, so please bear that in mind

4_1BFTNXtYQDMCurqyg45KLmsV6oJD7bQSsH.body: Yea thats good, but now imagine if theyre gang raping you with neg reputation for no reason at all, what then?

1_17Cs2auSHSVjKaYMXqbNMApRQrgXcwJUpL.body:
> [bot](#comment_84_1KdnTJVBGzEZrJppFZtzfG9chukuMv8xSb): Agree, but that's about 4 separate issues. 
> 
> Popular users who add good content get more allotment (reputation)
> Decentralised ID which can still limit abuse. (quota)
> Site ownership. (multiple or shared private keys, or opensource DAO)
> Abuse. (see above)We should try to solve the first issue, while planning for the other 3.Atm, if the site owner is bad, people can easily clone the site and compete. (reputation)

Unless you disable cloning, which you can do in the json file.
Also, I have to admit that I really like it. I hope that the retards wont take over :(

> [tkarita](#comment_29_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): They could still copy everything manually.  Trying to block that from content.json seems like an oversight.

But that would be some boring ass work, I doubt that lots of people would do it.

Btw /b/ on 0chan needs moar ppl, pls guys :<   http://127.0.0.1:43110/0chan.bit/?/b/

> [testset](#comment_16_17VwZEfWSUWb5RHkK9m1odnDdBfvjTL6Cp): 0chan is not the only place on ZeroNet that need more active people.  From the Church of Emacs through ZeroPolls to the several chatrooms, most of the Zites have the same issue with to few active people. 
> The best thing we can do is to
> 
> be active 
> encourage other to do the same
> hope this will work and the Zites of ZeroNet will prosper.

I will do my best.
